title: World Metadata Schema
description: A schema for representing a world within The Wired

description.description: A brief description of the world

authors.description: Information about the authors of the world

address.description: The Ethereum address of the author

image.description: The URI of an image representing the world

host.description: The domain of the host server that manages connections and interactions within the world

extras.description: Any additional information related to the world

model.description: The URI of the glTF file representing the 3D world
